header.title: Gemini File Search
header.resetConfirmMessage: Do you want to delete the saved API key?
header.resetConfirmDescription: You will need to enter it again after deletion.

apiKeyModal.securityNote: Your API key is securely stored in your browser.

stores.title: Stores
stores.description: Select a File Search Store or add a new one
stores.emptyDescription: Add a new store to get started
stores.createModalDescription: Create a new File Search Store
stores.storeNameHint: Only alphanumeric, hyphens (-), and underscores (_) allowed
stores.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{name}" store?
stores.deleteConfirmWarning: This action cannot be undone and all documents will be deleted.

workspace.title: Query Workspace
workspace.systemInstructionPlaceholder: e.g., 'You are a professional technical writer. Provide clear and concise answers.'
workspace.systemInstructionHint: Defines the model's role, tone, and response format. Override the default to give the model specific expertise or style. Use this to set context for how the model should behave.
workspace.temperatureHint: Controls creativity and randomness of responses. Lower values (0.0-0.3) produce consistent, predictable answers ideal for technical documentation. Higher values (0.7-1.0) generate more creative and diverse responses suitable for creative writing. Default varies by model, typically ~1.0 for gemini-2.5-flash.
workspace.maxOutputTokensHint: Limits the maximum length of generated responses in tokens. 1 token â‰ˆ 0.75 English words or 1 character in other languages. Use 500-1000 for brief answers, 2000-4000 for detailed explanations. Default varies by model, typically ~8192 for gemini-2.5-flash.
workspace.topPHint: Controls cumulative probability-based sampling. 0.9 considers only tokens in the top 90% probability mass, maintaining quality while allowing diversity. Recommended: 0.9-0.95 for most use cases. Default varies by model, typically ~0.95.
workspace.topKHint: Limits the number of highest probability tokens to consider at each step. 40 means only the top 40 most likely tokens are candidates. Lower values (10-20) produce focused responses, higher values (40-80) allow more variety. Default varies by model, typically ~40.

documents.title: Document Management
documents.uploadHint: Multiple selections allowed Â· Max 10 files Â· Up to 50MB per file
documents.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{name}" document?
documents.customMetadataHint: Store additional information about the document as key-value pairs (max 20)
